sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {Card ,CardBody} from 'reactstrap' import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import './tour-card.css' const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id, title,photo,city,price,featured, reviews} =tour const totalRating =reviews?.reduce((acc,item)=>acc+ item.rating, 0) const avgRating= totalRating === 0 ? '' : totalRating ===1 ? totalRating : totalRating/reviews.length; return (
{ featured && Featured}
{city} {avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? 'Not Rated' : ({reviews.length}) }
{title}
${price} /per Person
) } export default TourCard
